Text:
Fantastic! A large torrent packed with good taste.
Keep this one alive, people!
Please seed this! I will seed until my hard disk dies if I get it!

Any chance of getting the CD covers for the Centenary Celebration (there are 4 CD's) Can't find them anywhere.
Thanks for the download
i found out last night that paul  o'dette happens to be my cousin in law dad told me the news
oh i forgot to add that i like the sound of the lute

Hi chdnolimits, any chance you could find out if there is print music available for the English Lute Duets?

Any info would be much appreciated!

Thank you Lazlo.
I have been captivated by the sound of the Lute for about ten years and thanks to people like Julian Bream , Paul O'Dette , etc, this music is becoming more available.
Dowland was a complete revelation to me and this collection is inspiring.
Appreciate your efforts and wish you well for 2009.
